entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, St. John's

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
